[DQC.US.0081.9278] The line item concept us-gaap:AccountsReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent with a value of 27,676 and a calculation parent of us-gaap:AssetsCurrent is represented as a sibling of us-gaap:DueFromRelatedPartiesCurrent with a value of 2,192,446 in the extension taxonomy role 102 - Statement - Consolidated Balance Sheets, but us-gaap:AccountsReceivableRelatedPartiesCurrent is represented as a descendent of us-gaap:DueFromRelatedPartiesCurrent in the us-gaap taxonomies. Period :2017-12-31 Dimensions : Unit : USD
